mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT1511SeikyugakuTsuchisho" ( "renban" smallint, "hokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hokenshaName" character varying(40), "shoKisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "shoKisaiHokenshaName" character varying(40), "kohiFutanshaNo" character varying(40), "kohiFutanshaName" character varying(40), "kanCode" character varying(40), "kanName" character varying(40), "kouCode" character varying(40), "kouName" character varying(40), "shinsaYM" rshare."UDD014YM", "kokuhorenName" character varying(40), "mokuCode" character varying(40), "mokuName" character varying(40), "serviceShuruiCode" character varying(40), "serviceShuruiMei" character varying(40), "t_Kensu" character varying(40), "t_JitsuNissu" character varying(40), "t_Tanisu" character varying(40), "t_Kingaku" character varying(40), "s_Kensu" character varying(40), "s_Tanisu" character varying(40), "s_Choseigaku" character varying(40), "kaigokyufuSogojigyohi" character varying(40), "riyoshaFutangaku" character varying(40), "kohiFutangaku" character varying(40), "gokeiChohyoRecordShubetsu" character varying(40), "t_GokeiKensu" numeric(13,0), "t_GokeiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "t_GokeiKingaku" numeric(13,0), "s_GokeiKensu" numeric(13,0), "s_GokeiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "s_GokeiChoseigaku" numeric(13,0), "gokeiKaigokyufuSogojigyohi" numeric(13,0), "gokeiRiyoshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "gokeiKohiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "ruisekiChohyoRecordShubetsu" character varying(40), "t_RuisekiKensu" numeric(13,0), "t_RuisekiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "t_RuisekiKingaku" numeric(13,0), "s_RuisekiKensu" numeric(13,0), "s_RuisekiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "s_RuisekiChoseigaku" numeric(13,0), "ruisekiKaigokyufuSogojigyohi" numeric(13,0), "ruisekiRiyoshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "ruisekiKohiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "tesuryoChohyoRecordShubetsu" character varying(40), "tesuryoSeikyugaku" numeric(13,0), "tesuiryoRuisekiSeikyugaku" numeric(13,0) )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" ( "errorKubun" character varying(40), "shoHokanehshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "key1" character varying(40), "key2" character varying(40), "key3" character varying(40), "key4" character varying(40), "key5" character varying(40), "hihokenshaKanaShimei" character varying(40), "hihokenshaShimei" character varying(40), "biko" character varying(40) )

insert.id: 請求額通知書一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT1511SeikyugakuTsuchisho" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{保険者番号}, #{保険者名}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{公費負担者番号}, #{公費負担者名}, #{款コード}, #{款名}, #{項コード}, #{項名}, #{審査年月}, #{国保連合会名}, #{目コード}, #{目名}, #{サービス種類コード}, #{サービス種類名}, #{通常分_件数}, #{通常分_実日数}, #{通常分_単位数}, #{通常分_金額}, #{再審査_過誤_件数}, #{再審査_過誤_単位数}, #{再審査_過誤_調整額}, #{介護給付_総合事業費}, #{利用者負担額}, #{公費負担額}, #{合計_帳票レコード種別}, #{合計_通常分_件数}, #{合計_通常分_単位数}, #{合計_通常分_金額}, #{合計_再審査_過誤_件数}, #{合計_再審査_過誤_単位数}, #{合計_再審査_過誤_調整額}, #{合計_介護給付_総合事業費}, #{合計_利用者負担額}, #{合計_公費負担額}, #{累計_帳票レコード種別}, #{累計_通常分_件数}, #{累計_通常分_単位数}, #{累計_通常分_金額}, #{累計_再審査_過誤_件数}, #{累計_再審査_過誤_単位数}, #{累計_再審査_過誤_調整額}, #{累計_介護給付_総合事業費}, #{累計_利用者負担額}, #{累計_公費負担額}, #{手数料_帳票レコード種別}, #{手数料_請求額}, #{手数料_累計請求額})

insert.id: 処理結果リスト一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" VALUES ( #{エラー区分}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{キー1}, #{キー2}, #{キー3}, #{キー4}, #{キー5}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{備考} )
